TopicTitle: Flying low to the north pole with EvE and Parallax - The modders did a great job.

Articles.Content:
So I redid "The fly to the north pole" with the modded gfx for KSP 1. Gotta say it looked a lot better than back in the day. If you want a nice relaxing beautefull flight I can highly recommend it.

Oddly the kraken decided to eat my nose wheel half way but restarting the game brought it back.

https://youtube.com/live/ZZ0iAAwBDEA

Couldn't find the old thread so posted a new one.
Problem with paralax is coming in from orbit. The pop in is very bad. Once low enough its gorgeous no question.
